00481    case OP_LAM_READ:
00482       /*
00483          return a BITWISE coded station NOT the station number
00484          i.e.: n = 5  ==> lam = 0x10
00485        */
00486 
00487       if (param > 3 || param < 0)
00488          return -EINVAL;
00489 
00490       adr = io_base + (param << 4);
00491       status = INP(adr + 6);
00492       if (status & (1 << 3)) {
00493          lam = (INP(adr + 8) & 0x1F);   // mask upper 3 bits
00494          lam = 1 << (lam - 1);
00495       } else
00496          lam = 0;
00497       return lam;
00498 
00499    case OP_LAM_CLEAR:

00529          return -EINVAL;
00530 
00531       adr = io_base + (param << 4);
00532       status = INP(adr + 6);
00533       return (status & (1 << 2)) > 0;
00534    }
00535 
00536    /* signal success */
00537    return 1;
00538 }
